title: Horticulture Society of Pakistan
text:
The Horticulture Society of Pakistan is based in <a href="Karachi">Karachi</a>, <a href="Pakistan">Pakistan</a>.
History.
In April 1948, the <a href="Pakistan%20Agri-Horticulture%20Society">Pakistan Agri-Horticulture Society</a> was established in Karachi. The <a href="Governor-General%20of%20Pakistan">Governor-General of Pakistan</a> was the Patron in Chief and the Governor of Pakistan Agri-Horticulture Society.
On 23 September 1949 it was renamed as Horticultural Society of Pakistan.
Horticulture.
<a href="Horticulture">Horticulture</a> is the branch of <a href="agriculture">agriculture</a> that deals with the <a href="art">art</a>, <a href="science">science</a>, <a href="technology">technology</a>, and <a href="business">business</a> of <a href="plant">plant</a> cultivation. It includes the cultivation of <a href="fruit">fruit</a>s, <a href="vegetable">vegetable</a>s, <a href="Nut%20%28fruit%29">nut</a>s, <a href="seed">seed</a>s, <a href="herb">herb</a>s, <a href="Shoot">sprouts</a>, <a href="mushroom">mushroom</a>s, <a href="algae">algae</a>, <a href="flower">flower</a>s, <a href="seaweed">seaweed</a>s and non-food crops such as grass and ornamental trees and plants. It also includes plant conservation, landscape restoration, landscape and garden design, construction, and maintenance, and <a href="arboriculture">arboriculture</a>.
